data_table.description: Diabetes Mellitus Status, Offspring Cohort Exams 1 - 9. Variables include diabetes mellitus status, fasting blood glucose levels and treatment status for diabetes. This dataset replaces vr_diab_ex08_1_0316.

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant identification number.

variable.name: CURR_DIAB1
variable.comment: Derived variable. For variable information see corresponding documentation.
